content: A little heads-up: at the end of June, Nictiz will release several patches for the zib FHIR profiles and the IG's for the MedMij information standards. The full overview of the intended fixes can be found here (please let us know if you disagree or have any other comments on the intended changes).

Hey @Pieter Edelman! Just wanted to check something - is there anywhere that these updates to zib FHIR profiles and/or MedMij IG's are announced, other than here in the FHIR chat? I feel like only the "big" updates (like a whole new standard) gets announced via the broader MedMij/Nictiz news updates, less so these more technical things. Or I might be missing something!

Hi @Aisha Sie, as Pieter is on leave I will answer this question. At this moment, MedMij announces the montly patch releases in their newsletter. Also, you can subscribe (watch) on our GitHub repo's like https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-STU3-Zib2017 and the Nictiz organization on Simplifier: https://simplifier.net/organization/nictiz

The (major) releases of new zib profiles are also announced on the Nictiz website.

A new selection of patch-worthy issues has been made regarding the FHIR profiles and IG's for the zibs and MedMij. The proposed solutions will be implemented during the coming two weeks. Feedback on the proposed/realized solution, impact analysis or further feedback during this time is greatly appreciated!
